design.ALREADY_EXIST: Resource name '%s' already exists. Try using a different name.
design.NAMING_CONVENTION: '%s' violates the naming convention for design or component. Allowed names should match (^[a-z][a-z0-9-]*[a-z0-9]$)
design.MISSING_FIELD: Invalid input or missing mandatory field '%s'
design.UNABLE_MODIFY_TYPE: Unable to delete or modify the component '%s'
design.PORT_VALIDATION: Invalid port format '%s. Allowed ports 1 to 65535
design.UNSUPPORTED_FILE: Given input file format is not supported. Supported formats are TXT, ZIP, TARZ
design.CODE_PUSH: Publish design failed. Failed to push the service artifacts to source control
design.TAG_CONVENTION: Malformed JSON or tag validation failed '%s'. Allowed tags ^[a-zA-Z-_]+(,[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+)*
design.COMPONENT_PENDING: Component '%s' has some missing mandatory fields
design.ROOT_MORE_LINK: Root node doesn't have more than one link
design.ALREADY_LINKED: Cannot link from component '%d' to component '%d'
design.REPO_HANDLE_PATH: Repository Url '%s' cannot be validated with account '%s'
design.SCALE_VALIDATION: Deployments attributes for '%s' is missing. Allowed values ([0-9]+)
design.INVALID_AUTO_FACT: Malformed JSON or Invalid autoscale factor '%s'
design.ALREADY_SCHEDULED: Publish design '%s' is already in progress
design.REGISTRY_ADD: Please Select Registry for this Design

all.INTERNAL_SERVER: Internal Error; Unable to communicate with internal-server
all.ERROR_HITTING_EXT_API: Unable to communicate with external resources
all.MISSING_FIELD: Invalid input or missing mandatory field '%s'
